name: simplicite
description: Simplicite(R) platform Javascript API (for node.js and browser)

scripts.compile: eslint src/simplicite.ts && tsc --moduleResolution node --module esnext --target esnext --outDir build/esm src/simplicite.ts && tsc --module commonjs --target es5 --esModuleInterop true --outDir build/cjs src/simplicite.ts
scripts.build: esbuild --minify --sourcemap --outfile=dist/simplicite.min.js src/simplicite.js && esbuild --outfile=dist/simplicite.mjs src/simplicite.js && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly --allowJs --outDir dist src/simplicite.js
scripts.doc: jsdoc -t node_modules/docdash -d docs src/simplicite.js README.md && replace '#fc83ff' '#98cbff' docs/styles/jsdoc.css && replace '#6d426d' '#2e76bd' docs/styles/jsdoc.css && replace '#CA79CA' '#edb8b8' docs/styles/jsdoc.css && replace '#606' '#094e93' docs/styles/jsdoc.css

author: Simplicite Software <contact@simplicitesoftware.com> (http://www.simplicitesoftware.com/)
